name: Carbon Black Defense V2
description: This app integrates with an instance of Carbon Black defense to run investigative and generic actions

actions.description: List devices connected to CB Defense
actions.verbose: The results of this action can be paged using the start and the limit parameters. For example, to return the first 10 results, set the start to 1 and the limit to 10. To return the next 10 results, set the start to 11 and keep the limit at 10. This Action requires Custom API Key, Custom API Connector ID, and Organization Key.

start.description: Number of first result to return

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

actions.description: Change the policy of a device connected to CB Defense
actions.verbose: This Action requires Custom API Key, Custom API Connector ID, and Organization Key.

policy_id.description: ID of policy to assign to device

actions.description: List policies that exist on CB Defense
actions.verbose: This Action requires API Key and API Connector ID.

actions.description: Create a new policy on CB Defense
actions.verbose: The json_fields parameter can be used to configure other fields in the created policy. This parameter takes a JSON dictionary with the format of the policy field seen here. In some negative scenarios action will fail with an API error message "Error creating policy - Error modifying policy" but policy will be created on the server with the given name. This Action requires API Key and API Connector ID.

json_fields.description: Other configuration fields in JSON format. Defaults to '{"sensor_settings": []}' if left empty

example_values: This is going to be deleted very soon

actions.description: Delete a policy on CB Defense
actions.verbose: This Action requires API Key and API Connector ID.

actions.description: Add a rule to a policy on CB Defense
actions.verbose: This Action requires API Key and API Connector ID.

actions.description: Delete a rule from a policy on CB Defense
actions.verbose: This Action requires API Key and API Connector ID.

actions.description: List processes that match supplied filter criteria
actions.verbose: The examples for the search_span parameter are 1d, 1w, 2y, 2h, 1m, or 50s (where y=year, w=week, d=day, h=hour, m=minute, s=second). The results of this action can be paged using the start and limit parameters. For example, to return the first 10 results, set the start to 1 and the limit to 10. To return the next 10 results, set the start to 11 and keep the limit at 10. This Action requires Custom API Key, Custom API Connector ID, and Organization Key.

search_span.description: Number of days back to search

start.description: Number of first result to return

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

actions.description: List events that match supplied filter criteria
actions.verbose: The parameters ip, host_name, hash, application, and owner apply only to the device the event came from. Thus, for example, the ip parameters cannot be used to search for a destination IP. The examples for the search_span parameter are 1d, 1w, 2y, 2h, 1m, or 50s (where y=year, w=week, d=day, h=hour, m=minute, s=second). This Action requires Custom API Key, Custom API Connector ID, and Organization Key.

search_span.description: Number of days back to search

example_values: The application "<share><link hash="c7db4ae8175c33a47baa3ddfa089fad17bc8e362f21e835d78ab22c9231fe370">C:\Windows\system32\svchost.exe -k netsvcs</link></share>" attempted to open the process "c:\windows\system32\wbem\wmiprvse.exe", by calling the function "OpenProcess". The operation was successful.

actions.verbose: This Action requires Custom API Key, Custom API Connector ID, and Organization Key.

example_values: The application "<share><link hash="cbc104fcc03cb2acbdafc2fe2669e8da54993f8d21d8851d4d80ecec26a3a9f0">C:\program files (x86)\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe</link></share>" invoked the application "<share><link hash="cbc104fcc03cb2acbdafc2fe2669e8da54993f8d21d8851d4d80ecec26a3a9f0">C:\program files (x86)\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe</link></share>". The operation was successful.

actions.verbose: This Action requires Custom API Key, Custom API Connector ID, and Organization Key.

example_values: Process waappagent.exe was detected by the report "Phishing Host" in watchlist "RecordedFutureRiskyIPs"

actions.verbose: This action retrieves the current list of notifications from CB Defense. Once a notification is retrieved, it cannot be retrieved again. This Action requires SIEM Key and SIEM Connector ID.

example_values: [Global Alert Notification] [Confer has detected a threat against your company.] [https://defense.phantom.local#device/844355/incident/38AW1VQY] [The application sh invoked a system application (ifconfig).] [Incident id: 38AW1VQY] [Threat score: 3] [Group: default] [Email: hedwards] [Name: hedwards-mac2] [Type and OS: MAC MAC OS X 10.10.5] [Severity: Monitored]
The application sh invoked a system application (ifconfig).

actions.description: Updates an existing policy on the Carbon Black Defense server
actions.verbose: This Action requires API Key and API Connector ID.

policy.description: JSON object containing the policy details (see https://developer.carbonblack.com/reference/carbon-black-cloud/platform/latest/policy-service/#update-policy)

policy_id.description: The ID of the policy to replace. This ID must match the ID in the request URL

actions.description: Retrieves an existing policy from the Carbon Black Defense server
actions.verbose: This Action requires API Key and API Connector ID.

policy_id.description: The ID of the policy to retrieve
